'Pregnenolone', 3beta-Hydroxypregn-5-en-20-one is an endogenous steroid hormone
involved in the steroidogenesis of progestogens, mineralocorticoids,
glucocorticoids, androgens, and estrogens, as well as the neuroactive steroids.
As such it is a prohormone, though it also has biological effects of its own,
behaving namely as a neuroactive steroid in its own right with potent anxiolytic
effects.
